In this case, even if the user fails to complete transfer operation, the user shall be charged with gas fees by the relevant block-chain network.

Article 76 The user shall be liable for all the taxes and other expenses incurred during the transactions on the platform.

Chapter XI Termination of this Agreement

Article 77 The user shall have the right to apply for the cancellation of the platform wallet to the platform at any time, and this Agreement shall be terminated upon the approval for the user to cancel the wallet by the platform.

Article 78 If an account is cancelled according to Articles 32 and 33 of this Agreement, this Agreement shall be terminated upon the cancellation of the user account on the platform.

Article 79 If the user dies or is declared dead, his/ her rights and obligations under this Agreement shall be borne by his/ her successor. If the user loses all or partial capacity of civil rights or civil conduct, the platform or its authorized subject shall have the right to dispose of the funds related to the user's account according to effective legal documents (including the effective court judgment, etc.) or the instructions of its legal guardian. If the successor or legal guardian decides to continue to perform this Agreement, this Agreement shall remain valid; otherwise, the successor or legal guardian is required to apply to the platform for account cancellation according to this Agreement, and this Agreement shall be terminated upon the approval for the user to cancel the account by the platform.

Article 80 The platform shall have the right to terminate all services provided by the platform according to this Agreement. This Agreement shall be terminated upon the termination of all services provided by the platform. The termination procedures shall be in accordance with the specific provisions of the platform announcement.

Article 81 The user shall, upon the termination of this Agreement, have no right to require the platform to continue to provide any services or to perform any other obligations, including but not limited to requiring the platform to retain or disclose any information in his/ her original website account to him/ her, or forwarding any information that has not been read or sent to him/ her or a third party.

Article 82 The termination of this Agreement shall not affect non-breaching party's claim to breaching party for breach liability prior to the terminations of other agreements, nor affect the performances of contractual obligations under this Agreement.

Chapter 12 Protection and authorization of personal information

Article 83 Personal information as referred to in Chapter 12 of this Agreement shall include the following information:

(I) Upon the registration of the platform account or the use of the account by the user, the personal registration information provided by the user according to the requirements of the platform shall include but is not limited to the phone number, email information, and identity card information;

(II) When the user uses the platform or visits the platform, the platform will automatically receive and record the values on the server of the user's browser, including but not limited to data such as IP address and web page records as required by the user;

(III) Relevant data collected by the platform on the transactions conducted by the user on the platform include but are not limited to transaction records;

(IV) Personal information of other users obtained by the platform through legal approaches.

Article 84 Without additional consent of the user, the successful registration by the user on the platform represents that the user agrees to collect, use or disclose his/ her personal information on the platform, and understands and agrees that, based on the consideration of customizing the platform services for the user, and resolving disputes and giving assistance to ensure the safe transactions on the platform, the platform may use the personal information that has been collected for the following purposes:

(I) The platform provides platform services to the user;

(II) The platform reports to the relevant authorities according to the requirements of relevant national or regional authorities;

(III) The platform will use the user's information for the purposes of identity authentication, customer service, security protection, fraud monitoring, marketing, archiving and backup, or cooperation with third parties to promote websites when the user uses platform services, so as to ensure the security of products and services provided by the platform to the user;

(IV) The personal information is provided to assist the platform to design new products and services, and to collect and to sort out the existing services, so as to improve the existing services;

(V) In order to enable the user to understand the specific conditions of the platform services, the user agrees that the platform will send him/ her the notices on marketing activities, commercial electronic information, and to provide advertisements related to the user to replace the general advertisements;

(VI) The platform transfers or discloses the user's information to any unrelated third party for the purpose of merger, division, acquisition or asset transfer;

(VII) Software certification or the upgrade of management software is conducted;

(VIII) The platform invites the user to participate in the survey related to platform services;

(IX) The personal information is used for data analysis during cooperation with government authorities, public affairs institutions, and associations, etc.;

(X) The personal information is used to settle or mediate disputes;

(XI) The personal information is used for all other legitimate purposes and other purposes authorized by the user.

Article 85 The platform shall automatically track down certain information about the user based on his/ her behaviors on the platform. Under the premise of not disclosing the privacy information of the user, the platform shall have the right for the analysis of the entire user database and for commercial use of the user database.

Article 86 The user agrees that the platform may use data collection devices such as "Cookies" on certain web pages of the platform.

Article 87 The platform protects the user's data according to the relevant laws and regulations. The platform will not maliciously sell or share the information provided to the platform by the user due to the performance of this Agreement to any third party, except for the following parties:

(I) Suppliers who provide independent services and only require necessary information related to the services provided;

(II) Government authorities or other institutions which have legal access to information and get access to information through legal approaches;

(III) Companies affiliated to the platform;

(IV) A third party agreed by the platform user or the authorized representative thereof.

Article 88 Unless otherwise provided by the laws, the user authorization platform shall use the information provided by the user to the platform, the information generated from enjoying the platform services (including the information provided and generated prior to the conclusion of this Agreement), and those inquired and collected by the platform according to the provisions of this article, for the purpose of providing services, recommending products, conducting market research and analyzing information data by the platform and its necessary entrusted partners.

Article 89 Unless otherwise provided by the law, the user authorization platform shall provide, inquire and collect user information to partners necessary for the platform to cooperate with, for the purpose of providing the user with better services and products.  

Article 90 In order to ensure the security of the user’s information, the platform and its partners are obliged to keep confidential the above information, and to take various measures to ensure the security of information.

Article 91 The provisions of Chapter 12 of this Agreement shall come into force upon the conclusion of this Agreement and shall have independent legal effect, and shall not be affected by whether the contract is concluded or the whether its effectiveness changes.

Chapter 13 Protection of intellectual property rights

Article 92 All contents of the platform, including works, pictures, files, information, data, platform architecture, layout of platform images, platform design, words and charts, software compilation, relevant source code and software shall be legally owned by the platform or other right owners, including trademark rights, patent rights, copyright, and trade secrets, etc.

Article 93 Without the written consent of the platform or other right owners, nobody is allowed to use, alter, copy, publicly disseminate, change, distribute, release or publicly publish the platform procedures or contents.

Article 94 The user shall not download (except for page caching) or alter the platform or any part thereof without the expressed written consent of the platform. The user shall not resell or make commercial use of the platform or its contents; shall not collect and make use of product catalogue, description and price; shall not make any derivative use of the platform or its contents; and shall not download or copy account information for other commercial interests, or use any data collection, Robots or similar data collection and extraction tools. Without the written permission of the platform, it is strictly prohibited to systematically acquire the contents of the platform to directly or indirectly create, edit or compile database or personal address book (whether through Robots, Spiders, automatic instruments or manual operation or not). In addition, it is strictly prohibited to use the contents and materials on the platform for any purpose not stipulated in the expressed use conditions.

Article 95 Without the expressed written consent of the platform, the website of the platform or any part thereof shall not be reproduced, copied, imitated, sold, resold, visited or otherwise used for any commercial purposes. Without the expressed written consent of the platform, the user shall not own the trademark, logo or other proprietary information (including images, texts, web designs or forms) of the platform or its affiliates using any skills. Without the expressed written consent of the platform, the user shall not use the names and trademarks of the platform or its affiliates in the form of Meta Tags or any other "hidden text". Any unauthorized use will result in the termination of the permission or license granted by the platform.

Article 96 No intellectual property rights shall be deemed to be transferred from the platform to the user when the user logs on the platform or uses any service provided by the platform. Respect for intellectual property rights is the obligation of the user. In case of any violation, the user shall bear legal liabilities such as damages for the platform.

Chapter XIV General terms

Article 97 This Agreement is jointly signed between the user and the platform, and is applicable to all activities of the user on the platform. The contents of this Agreement include the terms of the main body of this Agreement and various rules that have been or may be published in the future. All terms and rules are an integral part of this Agreement and have the same legal effect as the main body of this Agreement.

Article 98 If any provision of this Agreement is considered to be unenforceable, invalid or illegal by any authority having jurisdiction, the validity of the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall not be affected.

Article 99 The rights and obligations stipulated in this Agreement shall also be binding on the transferees, successors, executors and administrators of all parties who are benefited from such rights and obligations through transfer. The user shall not transfer the rights or obligations under this Agreement to any third party without our consent, but the platform may transfer our rights and obligations under this Agreement to any third party at any time, and issue a notice to the user thirty (30) days prior to the transfer.

Article 100 If any provision of this agreement is invalid or unenforceable, in whole or in part, for any reason, it shall be deemed to be severed from this Agreement and be replaced by a new valid provision as close as possible to the intention of the parties, and able to retain the economic purpose as required by this Agreement, and in this case, the other provisions of this Agreement shall remain in full force and their binding forces.

Article 101 Unless otherwise agreed in other terms of this Agreement, no provision in this Agreement shall be deemed to appoint, imply or otherwise consider the platform as the agent, trustee or other representatives of the user.

Article 102 The failure of either party to exercise its rights or seek remedies in connection with this Agreement in respect of a single event under this Agreement shall not affect the party to subsequently exercise such rights or seek remedies in respect of that single event or other events.

Article 103 The waiver to breach this contract or any provision of this Agreement shall come into force only when non-breaching party or the party not seeking remedies signs and agrees to the waiver in writing. No waiver to the breach this Agreement shall be deemed or construed as a waiver to any subsequent or other violations by non-breaching party; and no failure to exercise any right or remedies shall be in any way construed as a waiver to such right or remedies.

Article 104 This Agreement is signed in accordance with the Laws of the People's Republic of China, and its conclusion, interpretation, contents and fulfillment shall be governed by the relevant laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China. Any claim or lawsuit arising therefrom or related to this Agreement shall be interpreted and resolved according to the Laws of the People's Republic of China.

Article 105 Unless otherwise agreed in other articles under this Agreement, both parties agree that any claim or lawsuit arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be arbitrated by the Singapore International Arbitration Commission.

Article 106 This Agreement shall come into force upon the creation of the wallet by the user, and shall be binding on both parties.

Article 107 The platform shall reserve the final interpretation right of this Agreement.
